mapper.select: SELECT sub_idx, sub_name, sub_price, sub_start FROM subscribe WHERE sub_sort_idx = 0 AND sub_state NOT IN ('종료') LIMIT 3
SELECT sub_idx, sub_name, sub_price, sub_start FROM subscribe WHERE sub_sort_idx = 1 AND sub_state NOT IN ('종료') LIMIT 3
SELECT menu_idx, menu_name, menu_price, menu_start, menu_photo FROM menu WHERE menu_state NOT IN ('비활성화') AND menu_idx NOT IN ('ME022') ORDER BY menu_idx desc LIMIT 3

SELECT e.emp_name, m.msg_content, m.msg_date, mb.message_time, mb.msg_idx FROM message m, message_box mb, employee e WHERE m.emp_id = e.emp_id AND mb.msg_idx = m.msg_idx AND mb.emp_id = #{param1} ORDER BY m.msg_date desc, mb.message_time;
